citation_details.title: Flexible, scalable, high channel count stereo-electrode for recording in the human brain
citation_details.author: K Lee, AC Paulk, YG Ro, DR Cleary
citation_details.abstract: Over the past decade, stereotactically placed electrodes have become the gold standard for  deep brain recording and stimulation for a wide variety of neurological and psychiatric
citation_details.short_author: K Lee, AC Paulk, YG Ro, DR Cleary
